colors.name: AZ blue
colors.description: AZ Blue is used in the logo and navigation.

colors.name: Light blue
colors.description: Light blue is used to indicate links.

colors.name: Navy blue
colors.description: This colour is used for all of the text content on the site, instead of black.

colors.name: Black
colors.description: Black is used for emphasis in text.

colors.name: Orange
colors.description: Orange is used for breaking news items and should be used sparingly.

colors.name: Yellow
colors.description: Yellow is used for subtle highlights & drawing attention to certain section and should be used sparingly.

colors.name: Dark grey
colors.description: Dark grey is for contextual tags, quotes, captions and other small details.

colors.name: Medium grey
colors.description: Medium grey is for backgrounds that need to stand out.

colors.name: Light grey
colors.description: Light grey is used to infer subtle backgrounds on pieces of content.

colors.name: Very light grey
colors.description: Light grey is used to infer subtle backgrounds on pieces of content.
